landing.bio: Software Engineer from SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Chennai. Interested in Web Development, Software Development and Cyber Security.

experience.aboutWork: Currently, working on a project that provides support to an Australia-based Insurance company, I also worked on a project that was responsible for managing the DBs, support for payment-related services of a US-based Healthcare company.

After Compeletion of internship received offer letter. Worked in Full Stack Web Development. Worked in Capstone Project in that created a web application related to travel services. Used Angular for front-end and .Net Core for back-end. Also developed APIs .Net Core.

Worked on Microsoft Stream for full-stack web development.I was responsible for the creation of business logic backend APIs using the .NET Core framework.I also worked on the Angular6 framework using TypeScript for the creation of front-end for websites and utilizing its capability for performing client-side validation. Received Offer Letter.
In this one-month internship worked with a professional team that was developing client website. I learned and worked on HTML5+CSS and little bit of JavaScript.

This one-month internship was a great learning experience for me. I gained basic knowledge about computer networks and as my company was a Class B internet service provider (as per Indian Standards), I got basic idea about working of Class B ISP and network architecture. There we simulated network using Cisco Packet Tracer.

education.university: SRM Institute of Science and Technology
Shiv Jyoti Sr. Sec. High School

certifications.name: HackTrack
certifications.about: This was 2 days workshop on Ethical Hacking Workshop organized by TechDefence Lab.

certifications.name: Short Term Training Program on Deep Learning and its Application in NLP, Image and Video Analysis with Hands on Session
certifications.about: This was 5 days workshop on Deep Learning and Its Application. There we learned basic of ML & DL and had hands on session of Image and video analysis which was organized by Department of Software Engineering, SRM Institute of Science and Technology KTR Campus.

certifications.name: Programming, Data Structures and Algorithms Using Python (NPTEL Course)
certifications.about: This was 8 weeks python course for basic python, Data Structures and Algorithms

projects.name: Automatic HTML code generation from mock-up images using Neural Networks
projects.about: For my final year project, I have developed a tool that could be used for generating HTML code and hence basic web pages by taking a hand-drawn image of the webpage design as an input. I have trained a FasterRCNN model for detecting the position of different elements of a website in the input image and have written a python script for generating the desired HTML code. This project could help people who want to develop a simple website but do not have the required skill or resources for doing the same. It could also prove useful in bridging the gap between clients and developers.

projects.name: Complimentr Application Using Flask
projects.about: Complimentr is an flask App which uses Twilio's SMS API to send Compliment in the form of SMS to a desired phone number

projects.name: Network-Scanner
projects.about: This project is an application which gives the user their IP and MAC address and for all the devices connected within the same network. I developed this using Python Tkinter, System and OS commands.

projects.name: Payment Portal GUI Using Python and SQL
projects.about: This project simulates payment process involved in any UPI transaction. In this project UPI database was made using MySQL and GUI using python Tkinter.

projects.name: Blog Application Using Django
projects.about: This project is a blog application which lets user create, like and comment on posts. Profile creation and admin UI are some of the features. I developed this using Django.
